name: Logitech Z906 Surround Sound Speaker System | Dell USA
description: Experience the big, bold surround sound with the Z906 Speaker System from Logitech®. With this speaker system you will hear-and feel-immersive audio from 500-Watts (RMS) of power that brings music, movies, and games to life. Plus, digital and analog inputs provides flexibility to connect up to six audio sources likes TV, Blu-ray™/DVD player, DVR, Xbox 360®, PlayStation®3, Wii®, iPod®, PC and more. Also, the Easy-to-read control console fits in with your home-entertainment system and gives you control of your audio; change the volume on all your speakers, turn the power on or off, set inputs and more. Moreover with the Wall-mountable satellites you can transform any room into a home theater. With all these features and more the speaker system comes with a remote control, now you can control your listening experience without ever getting off the couch.
